name: AbcMatrix
brief: Cache-optimized matrix for ABC simplex with multiple copies

algorithms.name:
Row Copy Organization:
For dual simplex ratio test (dualColumn1):
  1. Compute π = c_B'·B⁻¹ (BTRAN)
  2. For each nonbasic j: compute π·A_j using row copy
  3. Partitioned row copy skips basic columns

see: CoinPackedMatrix in CoinUtils for underlying storage
